comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: LOC -- Bain's original photo caption says "BUILDING" -- not "BLDG." But since the term "building" is both verb and noun, and can refer to both a process and an an object, "construction" is a less ambiguous word, and is the one that should have been used.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Compare with this construction photo, also from the Bain/LOC collection, that was posted on June 4, 2010. It shows the other side of the same construction project:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4668744247/in/photostream/]
